name: Pit-Hag
ability: Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Pit-Hag points to a player and a character on the sheet. If that character is not in play, wake that player and show 'You are' card and the new character token. If the new character is a Demon, show the Demon info tokens and then the Minion tokens.
